text: Motion

Oh, Fuyuko,
Good work.
...Good work

You, before,
when you talked to Fuyu ────

That Fuyu should think about what she wan't to do
and about why she wants to continue being an idol.

... and in order to make that a reality,
what is it that must be done now.

What do I want to do...
That was decided from the very start...
Is it fine to just watch from behind?

If you follow the back in front of you, it might be easier.
The path has already been opened, all you have to do is follow it.

──── But...
Isn't the truth that you want to blaze your own trail?
Motion

Saying something like "Wanting to blaze your own trail"
sounds so conceited.
T-That's...

...Yeah, it's true though.
Exaclty as you said it.

It was such a timid and boring way of thinking,
not like Fuyu at all...!
There's not a single part of me willing to accept a loss.
Even to her.

Yeah!
That's what defines you, Fuyuko.
Motion
